lang::Hash< K > Class Template Reference
[Language support library]

#include <Hashtable.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

template<class K>
class lang::Hash< K >

Default hash functor used by Hashtable.

Uses 'int K::hashCode()' for hashing if the key is not basic arithmetic type.


Public Member Functions

int operator() (const K &x) const
